main event: A ground-radar operator observed one object that appeared on the radar scope and was tracked for 3 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was tracked on ground-radar but no other details were provided on how it was detected and lost.
The report states the sighting was likely caused by an electronic malfunction or ground-return rather than an actual unidentified flying object.
The radar operator was unable to provide any detailed information about the tracking of the object.
The report requests more details on the radar tracking, but they have not yet been received.
No photographs were taken of the observed object.
sighted object: one unknown object tracked on radar
